title: A call for corporate America to step up on homeless crisis
description: Business School initiative brings together leaders from business, government, academia.
content:
Many give much of themselves to help the homeless.
Take Mike Jellison. He knows about drug addiction, familial estrangement, prison, and recovery and brings it all to bear on his work as a recovery … [+5750 chars]
source: Harvard School of Engineering and Applied Sciences
